      Hugh D. (David) Politzer Hugh D. (David) Politzer Richard Chace Tolman Professor of Theoretical Physics Contact information for Hugh D. (David) Politzer MC 452-48 416 Downs-Lauritsen Laboratory (HEP) 626-395-4252 politzer@theory.caltech.edu Personal Website B.S., University of Michigan, 1969; Ph.D., Harvard University, 1974. Visiting Associate, Caltech, 1975-76; Associate Professor, 1977-79; Professor, 1979-2004; Tolman Professor, 2004-. Executive Officer for Physics, 1986-88.
